en.bio: I began my programming journey in 2020, little did I know it would become a passion that transformed my professional life! I have worked as a Full-Stack Developer with experience in omnichannel systems, enterprise resource planning (ERP) softwares, E-Commerce, payment integration, and artificial intelligence applications.
